result.title: BinSearch
result.content:
BinSearch

llong n, m;    
llong a[MXN];     
      
int main () {          
    //ios;        
    //freopen ("input.txt", "r", stdin);        
    cin >> n >> m;          
    for (llong i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {          
        cin >> a[i];            
    } sort (a + 1, a + n + 1);           
    for (llong i = 1; i <= m; i ++) {       
        llong x;            
        cin >> x;                      
        llong l = 1, r = n, bar = 0;            
        while (l <= r) {                 
            llong mid = (l + r) / 2;           
            if (a[mid] == x) {         
                bar = 1;      
                break;               
            } else if (a[mid] > x) {        
                r = mid — 1;         
            } else {               
                l = mid + 1;          
            }         
        } if (bar == 1) {             
            cout << "YES\n";              
        } else {                
            cout << "NO\n";                 
        }             
    } return 0;            
}
